org.openjdk.tools.javac.api

接口 DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractDiagnosticFormatter.SimpleConfiguration, BasicDiagnosticFormatter.BasicConfiguration, ForwardingDiagnosticFormatter.ForwardingConfiguration, RichDiagnosticFormatter.RichConfiguration
    封闭接口:
    DiagnosticFormatter<D extends Diagnostic<?>>

    public static interface DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration
    This interface provides functionalities for tuning the output of a diagnostic formatter in multiple ways.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.DiagnosticPart
      A given diagnostic message can be divided into sub-parts each of which might/might not be displayed by the formatter, according to the current configuration settings.
      static class  DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.MultilineLimit
      A multiline limit control the verbosity of multiline diagnostics either by setting a maximum depth of nested multidiagnostics, or by limiting the amount of subdiagnostics attached to a given diagnostic (or both).

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getMultilineLimit(DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.MultilineLimit limit)
      Get a multiline diagnostic limit.
      Set<DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.DiagnosticPart> getVisible()
      Retrieve the set of diagnostic parts that should be displayed by the formatter.
      void setMultilineLimit(DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.MultilineLimit limit, int value)
      Set a limit for multiline diagnostics.
      void setVisible(Set<DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.DiagnosticPart> visibleParts)
      Configure the set of diagnostic parts that should be displayed by the formatter.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(Set<DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.DiagnosticPart> visibleParts)
        Configure the set of diagnostic parts that should be displayed by the formatter.
        参数:
        visibleParts - the parts to be set

      • getVisible

        Set<DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.DiagnosticPart> getVisible()
        Retrieve the set of diagnostic parts that should be displayed by the formatter.
        返回:
        verbosity options

      • setMultilineLimit

        void setMultilineLimit(DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.MultilineLimit limit,
                       int value)
        Set a limit for multiline diagnostics. Note: Setting a limit has no effect if multiline diagnostics are either fully enabled or disabled.
        参数:
        limit - the kind of limit to be set
        value - the limit value

      • getMultilineLimit

        int getMultilineLimit(DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.MultilineLimit limit)
        Get a multiline diagnostic limit.
        参数:
        limit - the kind of limit to be retrieved
        返回:
        limit value or -1 if no limit is set
